source.name: Radiation Information Database (RADINFO) Widget
source.description: The Radiation Information Database (RADINFO) widget displays facilities in a user-specified area of interest that are regulated by EPA for radiation and radioactivity as reported by the Radiation Information Database (RADINFO).

datasets.name: Radiation Information Database (RADINFO) Widget
datasets.description: The Radiation Information Database (RADINFO) widget displays facilities in a user-specified area of interest that are regulated by EPA for radiation and radioactivity as reported by the Radiation Information Database (RADINFO).
